thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 06 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-RBC Global Asset Management Announces January Sales Results For RBC Funds, Ph&N Funds And Bluebay Funds

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-RBC Global Asset Management Announces January Sales Results For RBC Funds, Ph&N Funds And Bluebay Funds
text:
Feb 6 (Reuters) - RBC GLOBAL ASSET MANAGEMENT INC:
* RBC GLOBAL ASSET MANAGEMENT INC. ANNOUNCES JANUARY SALES RESULTS FOR RBC FUNDS, PH&N FUNDS AND BLUEBAY FUNDS
* RBC GLOBAL ASSET MANAGEMENT INC - ‍MUTUAL FUND ASSETS UNDER MANAGEMENT INCREASED BY 0.8 PERCENT IN JANUARY
* RBC GLOBAL ASSET MANAGEMENT INC - JANUARY MUTUAL FUND NET SALES OF $1.8 BILLION​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
